name: Pulse170448
description: Pulse iterates over a hexagonal grid using a periodic function. The seed for this render is 170448. Hue values centre around 201.44049 and the process renders approximately 180.0 dots per frame. A small constant of 0.42347932 and a large constant of 23.6557 are used to generate the function values. Function choice is 20, background choice is 0, hue choice is 6, saturation choice is 0, brightness choice is 1, opacity choice is 0, renderChoice is 4, postprocessing is 0 and a hexagon direction of 1 is selected.
